rooms.name: Entrance Hall (North-Facing)
rooms.description: Open foyer aligned to the North for positive Vastu energy. A split-level design with a raised entrance.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Art Deco accents and ample natural light from North-facing windows.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining space adjacent to the living room, optimized for joint family gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully functional kitchen with modern appliances and ergonomic design.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library area for books and reading, placed in a quiet corner to enhance concentration per Vastu.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Compact servant living space near the service entrance for convenience.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Lavish master suite with Art Deco detailing and a private balcony overlooking the terrace.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom designed for joint family members with natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Spacious room ensuring comfort and privacy, incorporating local design elements.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for extended family members or guests.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Extensive terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings, featuring Art Deco decorative elements.
